channel.title: Perfect hits
channel.description: Well, I've made my AGS, barrows gloves, fire cape and perfect ring all have 99999 bonus to every stat, and still I can't seem to 1 hit KO everyone. I hit a bunch of decent hits, but never one-hit KO. It's propaganda based, so if anyone has any ideas .. Just help? Please? :D

item.title: Perfect hits
item.dc:creator: @Wildfire Wildfire
item.description:
@Wildfire wrote:

Anyone care to help?

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect hits
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Wildfire, post:30, topic:297186”][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=393228.msg2926979#msg2926979 date=1251067048]

Don’t use that source then?..

It’s a pretty decent source, and will be great once I fix a glitch that I can’t find (…) Anyway, instead of the half-assed retarded comments from people like Anfernio, can I get some real ideas? I tried changing the AGS spec in rs2hd/model/Specials.java but there was a compile error elsewhere, so I took it back out of the compiler (It wasn’t in there originally)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2009, 12:30:48 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2009, 12:59:25 pm[/size][hr]Hello!

Well, I was going to help you, but I’m a “half-assed retarded”.
[/quote]

No you weren’t. You told me not to use that source - That’s not helping. If you have something better than that to say, I’ll be glad to apologize. Until then …[/quote]

I was going to say it had to do with the numbers in maxhitcalc, but nevermind.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect hits
item.dc:creator: @Wildfire Wildfire
item.description:
@Wildfire wrote:

[quote=“Jddogg9, post:8, topic:297186”][quote author=Wildfire link=topic=393228.msg2926714#msg2926714 date=1251056531]

Rofl,…
Then obviously the combat is not based on strength bonus

go into client.java

search for

calculatemaxhit()

Make that

[code] public void CalculateMaxHit() {
double MaxHit = 0;
int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; // Strength Bonus
int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; // Strength
int RngBonus = playerBonus[4]; // Ranged Bonus
int Range = playerLevel[playerRanged]; // Ranged

	if ((FightType == 1) || (FightType == 4)) {
		// Accurate & Defensive
		MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175));
	} else if (FightType == 2) {
		// Aggresive
		MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175));
	} else if (FightType == 3) {
		// Controlled
		MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175));
	}
	MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.1);
	if (StrPrayer == 1) {
		// Burst Of Strength
		MaxHit += 1;
	} else if (StrPrayer == 2) {
		// Super Human Strength
		MaxHit += 2;
	} else if (StrPrayer == 3) {
		// Ultimate Strength
		MaxHit += 3;
	}
	playerMaxHit = (int) Math.floor(MaxHit);
}[/code]

I don’t have a client.java
[/quote]

rofl?[/quote]

Strangely enough, some 525’s DON’T FUCKING HAVE A CLIENT.JAVA

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect hits
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“Wildfire, post:7, topic:297186”][quote author=c u in lumb link=topic=393228.msg2926674#msg2926674 date=1251054747]
Rofl,…
Then obviously the combat is not based on strength bonus

go into client.java

search for

calculatemaxhit()

Make that

[code] public void CalculateMaxHit() {
double MaxHit = 0;
int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; // Strength Bonus
int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; // Strength
int RngBonus = playerBonus[4]; // Ranged Bonus
int Range = playerLevel[playerRanged]; // Ranged

	if ((FightType == 1) || (FightType == 4)) {
		// Accurate & Defensive
		MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175));
	} else if (FightType == 2) {
		// Aggresive
		MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175));
	} else if (FightType == 3) {
		// Controlled
		MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175));
	}
	MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.1);
	if (StrPrayer == 1) {
		// Burst Of Strength
		MaxHit += 1;
	} else if (StrPrayer == 2) {
		// Super Human Strength
		MaxHit += 2;
	} else if (StrPrayer == 3) {
		// Ultimate Strength
		MaxHit += 3;
	}
	playerMaxHit = (int) Math.floor(MaxHit);
}[/code]

[/quote]

I don’t have a client.java[/quote]

rofl?

Read full topic
